content: these jumbo bearies are the perfect project for a crocheter who wants to take their amigurumi to the next level chenille yarn makes it easy to work up this large scale project fairly quickly **yarn ** #6 super bulky weight yarn approximately 210 yards of bernat baby blanket sparkle in hot pink a 20 yards of bernat baby blanket in misty jungle green b and 2 yards of bernat blanket in coal c **supplies ** 7mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge yarn needle scissors 2 45mm safety eyes stuffing approx 16 ounces stitch marker **difficulty level ** easy **stitches & techniques used ** chain s chain s st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 together decrease half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet **terms of use ** you are welcome to sell any items you make using this pattern in small quantities mass production is prohibited when selling online please credit julie king / gleeful things by linking to www gleefulthings com or tagging @gleefulthings you may not sell or distribute the pattern itself in any form alter it to claim it as your own post it online or create a video demonstrating the pattern copyright © 2025 julie king / gleeful things all rights reserved
